import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Hero} from '../hero'; import {HEROES} from '../mock-heroes' @Component({ selector: 'app-heroes', templateUrl: './heroes.component.html', styleUrls: ['./heroes.component.scss'] }) export class HeroesComponent { hero: Hero = {id: 1, name: 'Windstorm'}; heroes = HEROES; }
